com.vectorprint.configuration.binding

  • Packages that use com.vectorprint.configuration.binding 
    Package Description
    com.vectorprint.configuration.binding
    Bind your settings and / or Parameterizable objects to a syntax of your choice.

    com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.settings

    Class and Description
    BindingHelper
    Responsible for converting Strings into (atomic) values and vise versa.

    tries to construct a URL from a String.
    StringConverter
    Turns a String into a value of another type
  • Classes in com.vectorprint.configuration.binding used by com.vectorprint.configuration.binding.parameters 
    Class and Description
    AbstractBindingHelperDecorator
    The decoration pattern is advised if you need different behaviour on top of the two implementaions of the BindingHelper interface offered by this library.
    BindingHelper
    Responsible for converting Strings into (atomic) values and vise versa.
    BindingHelperImpl
    Responsible for converting Strings into (atomic) values and vise versa and for escaping meaningful characters for a certain syntax.
